live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48981.summary: Some customers in the Killarney area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48981.title: Apr 28 - Vancouver (Killarney) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
